title: STOP IGNORING AATROX
body:
seriously hes been in the gutter for SEASONS

The mini "rework" only took out AP aatrox gameplay which was the only truly viable way to play him

hes too item dependant and even then hes out scaled by almost every champion in league

his heal not scaling with his AD now makes him suck so much

the "new" passive sucks, and has sucked for the longest time, its highly unreliable to proc effectively in fights without ult, extremely hard in 1v1s, and its literally laughable at best

His Q has had rumors of being untargetable on his way down, but for it to even be relevant it needs to be untargetable completely like fizz's E is

The passive just needs to be reverted... this attack speed and AD crap is laughable at best, and the old revive was much more reliable and effective to play with... immagine anivia needing to land her whole combo, then get off another 6 auto attacks to be able to go into an egg...

Just saying, you guys have ignored aatrox for so long its beyond the level of frustrating to people who actually enjoy the champion, his style, and his lore....

why label him as this super old being and how he inspires people in war... but still have him in the state hes in? hes worse off than damn near any other champion in any patch in the history of this game

Hes literally THE ONLY CHAMPION IN LEAGUE WITH LESS THAN 5 DIAMOND+ MAINS
